languages.text: {n}Громогласно рассмеявшись, Волк скалит длинные клыки.{/n} "Такова порода вожаков, Ульфар. Нас отовсюду хорошо видать. Это ты, Пропащий, на свету теряешься". {n}В новом взрыве смеха громкоголосого Торбальда тонут сдавленные яростные ругательства Ульфара.{/n}

{n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Громогласно рассмеявшись, Волк скалит длинные клыки.{/n} "Такова порода вожаков, Ульфар. Нас отовсюду хорошо видать. Это ты, Пропащий, на свету теряешься". {n}В новом взрыве смеха громкоголосого Торбальда тонут сдавленные яростные ругательства Ульфара.{/n}

'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索巴德发出了雷鸣般的哈哈大笑，随即露出了长长的獠牙。{/n}“领袖就该是这个样子，乌尔法，我们与众不同。至于你，迷途之人，哪怕太阳就照在你头顶，你也找不到方向。”{n}索巴德再次哈哈大笑起来，盖过了乌尔法充满怒意的咒骂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德发出了雷鸣般的哈哈大笑，随即露出了长长的獠牙。{/n}“领袖就该是这个样子，乌尔法，我们与众不同。至于你，迷途之人，哪怕太阳就照在你头顶，你也找不到方向。”{n}索巴德再次哈哈大笑起来，盖过了乌尔法充满怒意的咒骂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le Space Wolf éclate d'un rire tonitruant en dévoilant ses longs crocs.{/n} « C'est l'étoffe des leaders, ça, Ulfar. Nous sortons du lot. C'est toi, l'Égaré, qui es incapable de trouver ton chemin alors que le soleil est juste au-dessus de ta tête. » {n}Une autre explosion du rire retentissant de Thorbald couvre les injures furieuses lâchées par Ulfar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Space Wolf éclate d'un rire tonitruant en dévoilant ses longs crocs.{/n} « C'est l'étoffe des leaders, ça, Ulfar. Nous sortons du lot. C'est toi, l'Égaré, qui es incapable de trouver ton chemin alors que le soleil est juste au-dessus de ta tête. » {n}Une autre explosion du rire retentissant de Thorbald couvre les injures furieuses lâchées par Ulfar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}狼は大笑いして長い牙を剥いた。{/n}「リーダーとはそういうものだ、ウルファー。我々は目立つ。太陽が頭上にあるのに自分の道を見つけられないのはお前のほうだ、エバーロスト」{n}トールバルドは再び大爆笑し、ウルファーの押し殺しつつも激しい罵声をかき消した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狼は大笑いして長い牙を剥いた。{/n}「リーダーとはそういうものだ、ウルファー。我々は目立つ。太陽が頭上にあるのに自分の道を見つけられないのはお前のほうだ、エバーロスト」{n}トールバルドは再び大爆笑し、ウルファーの押し殺しつつも激しい罵声をかき消した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Lobo estalla en una estruendosa carcajada y enseña sus largos colmillos.{/n} «Tal es la raza de los líderes, Ulfar. Nosotros destacamos. Eres tú, Perdido, el que no puede encaminarse ni con el sol en el cogote». {n}Otra risa desmedida de Thorbald ahoga la sofocada pero furiosa retahíla de insultos de Ulfar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo estalla en una estruendosa carcajada y enseña sus largos colmillos.{/n} «Tal es la raza de los líderes, Ulfar. Nosotros destacamos. Eres tú, Perdido, el que no puede encaminarse ni con el sol en el cogote». {n}Otra risa desmedida de Thorbald ahoga la sofocada pero furiosa retahíla de insultos de Ulfar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Wolf bricht in dröhnendes Gelächter aus und fletscht seine langen Zähne.{/n} "So ist das mit Anführern, Ulfar. Wir stechen heraus. Ihr seid es, Siegtnie, der seinen Weg nicht findet, wenn die Sonne direkt über Eurem Kopf steht." {n}Eine weitere Explosion von Thorbalds wildem Lachen übertönt Ulfars gedämpfte, aber doch ungeheuer zornige Schimpftirade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf bursts into booming laughter and bares his long fangs.{/n} "Such is the breed of leaders, Ulfar. We stand out. 'Tis you, Everlost, who cannot find his way when the sun is right over his head." {n}Another explosion of Thorbald's boisterous laughter drowns out Ulfar's stifled yet furious string of curses.{/n}

Ihr seid es, Siegtnie, der seinen Weg nicht findet, wenn die Sonne direkt über Eurem Kopf steht." {n}Eine weitere Explosion von Thorbalds wildem Lachen übertönt Ulfars gedämpfte, aber doch ungeheuer zornige Schimpftirade.{/n}
